channel.title: Is it safe to use WHX-Gateway without login?
channel.description: hi! WHX-Gateway works okay without login into any account - just lauching VM, and I use to power off it through ACPI too - as it gives much more perfomance flex in dead-line movement. how safe it is - wouldn't I met some security leaks doing that? thank you!

item.title: Is it safe to use WHX-Gateway without login?
item.dc:creator: DCC
item.source: Is it safe to use WHX-Gateway without login?

item.title: Is it safe to use WHX-Gateway without login?
item.dc:creator: HulaHoop
item.description:
DCC:

wouldn’t I met some security leaks doing that?

No.

Read full topic
